uk.ac.uea.mathsthing

Class Formula

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.mathsthing.Formula
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFormula

    public class Formula
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFormula
    A simplistic implementation of a mathematical formula representation. This will be replaced with a native C/C++ version when possible.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Woerner
